long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Experience the highway rush of high-speed driving with Speedy Car! Get behind the wheel of your car in this 2D endless runner game! Dodge traffic and push your limits as you race against the clock to set new records!

Speedy Car offers fast-paced action and addictive gameplay. Use the arrow keys to move through traffic and avoid collisions as you zoom down the highway. With each passing moment, the challenge intensifies, pushing your reflexes to the limit.
